law.catch_line: Clerk of the Court to report perpetrators.

text.section:
Sec. 11A-67. Clerk of the Court to report perpetrators.
Upon a final conviction for a domestic violence related crime, the Clerk of the Court shall forward a copy of such final conviction to the employer of record of the perpetrator.
For purposes of this section, "employer" shall mean any person, entity, corporation, partnership that employees any employee regardless of length of time or whether full or part-time.
